long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Get ready to become a public bus driver in a big city in this bus simulation game. Drive the bus from pick-up points to drop-off points and earn rewards. You can collect these rewards or use them to customize desired features for your bus. This game offers you the opportunity to become a real driver. It provides different bus mod options for you to experience the most realistic driving sensation with optimized bus simulation features.

Game Controls:

ARROW KEYS
